Are you a victim of crime?
Are you accused of a crime?
Are you a witness to a crime?
Are you a parent or guardian of a young person accused of a crime?
Are you a police officer based in Cambridge?
Are you a tax-payer living in Cambridge?
Are you a prosecution lawyer, defence lawyer, probation officer or any other professional working at Cambridge Magistrates' Court?

If any of the above apply to YOU then proposed changes to listings at Cambridgeshire Magistrates' Courts will affect YOU!!
